data_description.realtime_url: Link to the GTFS realtime protobuf feed
data_description.name: Friendly name for this integration

discover_stops.title: Discovering Stops
discover_stops.description:
Found **{agencies}** agency with **{stops_count}** stops ({size_mb} MB GTFS data).

Click **Submit** to continue selecting stops.

select_stops.title: Select Stops to Monitor
select_stops.description:
üöè **Found {stops_count:,} stops** in your GTFS data.

üí° **Select stops from the searchable dropdown below**

The dropdown contains all stops sorted by name. You can search and select multiple stops.

This keeps your database tiny and fast!

data_description.selected_stops: Choose one or more stops from the dropdown

review_groups.title: Review Stop Groups

group_stops.title: Create Stop Groups?
group_stops.description:
You can manually group stops together if desired.

**Selected:** {selected_count} stops

**No:** Treat each stop separately
**Yes:** Manually create stop groups (e.g., group opposite sides of a street together)

create_groups.title: Create Stop Group
create_groups.description:
Create a group of stops to monitor together.

**Your selected stops:**
{selected_stops_list}

üí° **Example:** Group 'Main St' and 'Main St (West)' together to see all departures in one sensor.

more_groups.title: Create More Groups?
more_groups.description:
‚úÖ Created **{groups_count}** group(s) so far.

Do you want to create more stop groups?

ask_routes.title: Filter by Routes?
ask_routes.description:
You can optionally filter by specific routes to make the database even smaller.

**No:** Monitor all routes that serve your selected stops (recommended for most users)
**Yes:** Only monitor specific routes (for advanced filtering)

select_routes.title: Select Routes to Monitor
select_routes.description:
üöå **Found {routes_count} routes** that serve your selected stops.

üí° **Select routes from the searchable dropdown below**

You can search and select multiple routes. Leave empty to monitor all discovered routes.

data_description.selected_routes: Choose routes to filter, or leave empty for all routes
